name: Candy Smash VR
description: Satisfy your hacking and slashing needs in colorful and mushy candy world. Experience the most fun you can have with VR and HTC Vive controllers smashing stuff!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: ntel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 200 MB available space
